name: D2S Technologies
overview:
We are a product conceptualization and build company with multiple user and business centric applications and portals under our portfolio.

Our featured portfolio products and portals include:

QLogin - A personal data security and password management application for individual end users

COMTrac central - A highly sophisticated web based vendor/recruitment management solution connecting clients, vendors and candidates via a customized central hub.

Kids Trove - A unique classifieds listing exclusively focussed on kids accessories.
